typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		OrderID as string,
		CustomerID as string,
		OrderDate as date 'yyyy-MM-dd',
		ShipDate as date 'yyyy-MM-dd',
		TotalCost as decimal(10,0),
		CreatedDate as date 'yyyy-MM-dd',
		UpdatedDate as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> OrdersNew
source(output(
		Column_1 as string,
		Column_2 as string,
		Column_3 as string,
		Column_4 as string,
		Column_5 as string,
		Column_6 as string,
		Column_7 as string,
		Column_8 as string,
		Column_9 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> OrderDetailsNew
